subject: Football
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: LOUISVILLE, Ky., Sept. 6 (AP) — Brian Brohm threw for a career-high 401 yards and 5 touchdowns and Anthony Allen added a team-record 275 yards rushing and two scores as No. 8 Louisville avoided a major upset by holding off Middle Tennessee, 58-42, on Thursday night.
